tour_name: Mendoza Wine Country & Buenos Aires Passion

sections.title: Buenos Aires: Tango & Tradition
sections.content: Immerse yourselves in the passionate heart of Buenos Aires. Explore the historic neighborhoods like San Telmo and La Boca, each brimming with unique character and vibrant street art. Indulge in a private tango show, a mesmerizing display of Argentine artistry and emotion. Savor a romantic dinner at a classic Argentine restaurant, known for its exquisite steaks and Malbec. Escape the city for a day at a traditional estancia (ranch), experiencing the gaucho lifestyle with horseback riding across the pampas, witnessing captivating folk dances, and feasting on a traditional asado (barbecue) under the open sky. Return to the city for the night.

sections.title: Mendoza's Uco Valley: Wine & Andes Views
sections.content: Take a scenic flight to Mendoza, gateway to Argentina's renowned wine region. Discover the Uco Valley, a landscape of rolling vineyards framed by the majestic Andes Mountains. Embark on exclusive wine tastings at prestigious wineries, learning about the art of winemaking and sampling award-winning Malbecs and other varietals. Experience the vineyards from a different perspective with a romantic horseback ride, followed by a gourmet picnic amidst the vines, with breathtaking panoramic views of the snow-capped Andes. Spend evenings at a luxurious wine resort, indulging in vinotherapy treatments and watching stunning sunsets over the vineyards.

sections.title: Mendoza: Continued Wine Exploration & Relaxation
sections.content: Continue your exploration of Mendoza's diverse wine region, venturing to smaller, boutique wineries for more intimate tastings and unique experiences. Discover hidden gems and family-run estates, where passion for winemaking runs deep. Dedicate a day to pure relaxation at your hotel's spa, indulging in rejuvenating treatments and enjoying the tranquil surroundings. Consider a hot air balloon ride over the vineyards for an unforgettable aerial perspective (optional, not included in base package). Each evening ends with gourmet dinners, featuring locally sourced ingredients paired with exceptional wines.

sections.title: Buenos Aires Farewell: VIP Tango & Departure
sections.content: Return to Buenos Aires for a final evening of Argentinian luxury. Enjoy a VIP dining experience and tango show at a historic venue, offering an unparalleled display of artistry and passion. Reflect on your incredible journey through Argentina's vibrant culture and stunning landscapes before preparing for your departure.
